channel.title: Connecting to my Server
channel.description:
Hello.
I've done everything, please tell me what I am missing.
This is what I have done:
1) I have downloaded JDK 6.0 and JDK 6 Update 4 2) I went into Environmental Variables and I typed in PATH and CLASSPATH and typed in the two variables. How do I ensure that Java is recognized? 3) I have created a No-IP account. 4) I have added a server (runeisle.no-ip.org) 5) I downloaded No-IP DUC and I signed into my account. I can see my server there at runeisle.no-ip.org. 6) I went into my gateway address at 192.168.2.1 (I have the Belkin router) so I went into Virtual Servers. Description - RSPS. Inbound Port - 43594-43594. Type - TCP. IP Address - I filled in the last digit of my IP address. Private Port - 43594-43594 7) I then saved the changes. 8) I downloaded MoparScape. 9) I downloaded TestScape source. 10) I double clicked on the runserver file. 11) It gave me this response: Starting TestScape Server on: 0.0.0.0:43594 12) I went into MoparScape and I typed in my username and password and for the server I typed in runeisle.no-ip.org and for the port, I put in 43594. 13) It says "Error connecting to server. Must be down. Click "Cancel" then "Start Server" to make your own."
Does anybody know how I can fix this?
Thank you.

item.description:
@Phree_xp wrote:

Yes, you missed read what Nail said, NO MORE POSTING.

Read full topic

Thanks.

Well i seriously doubt server status page is fixed… so the only way to make people know about your server is put the “ip” and “port” into your sig.
[/quote]

That is VERY irrevelient.[/quote]

i guess i misread, and ftr , its [size=15pt]irrelevant[/size]

item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

You dont have to put it an ip if you are running your own server, bring up Csk Client,(the best) silabs(YUCK!) and just click login, DONT put an ip, And it should log you in

item.title: Connecting to my Server
item.dc:creator: @Captain_Lover Captain Lover
item.description:
@Captain_Lover wrote:

Hello.

I’ve done everything, please tell me what I am missing.

This is what I have done:

  1. I have downloaded JDK 6.0 and JDK 6 Update 4
  2. I went into Environmental Variables and I typed in PATH and CLASSPATH and typed in the two variables. How do I ensure that Java is recognized?
  3. I have created a No-IP account.
  4. I have added a server (runeisle.no-ip.org)
  5. I downloaded No-IP DUC and I signed into my account. I can see my server there at runeisle.no-ip.org.
  6. I went into my gateway address at 192.168.2.1 (I have the Belkin router) so I went into Virtual Servers. Description - RSPS. Inbound Port - 43594-43594. Type - TCP. IP Address - I filled in the last digit of my IP address. Private Port - 43594-43594
  7. I then saved the changes.
  8. I downloaded MoparScape.
  9. I downloaded TestScape source.
  10. I double clicked on the runserver file.
  11. It gave me this response: Starting TestScape Server on: 0.0.0.0:43594
  12. I went into MoparScape and I typed in my username and password and for the server I typed in runeisle.no-ip.org and for the port, I put in 43594.
  13. It says “Error connecting to server. Must be down. Click “Cancel” then “Start Server” to make your own.”

Does anybody know how I can fix this?

Thank you.

Read full topic
